column1: Uchi////The fish is of the highest quality
column2: and is on your table 16 hours after being purchased at the Tsukiji Fish Market in Tokyo.  Unbelievable freshness
column4: just an explosion of flavor.  And the rice really is the best in the world.  I love the salty taste of soy sauce on my sushi
column5: but the subtle interplay of flavors in the sushi should be eaten with no interference.
